授業目的: The main purpose of this class is to develop students’ ability to write various kinds of texts. Students begin by writing paragraphs, and then short, multi-paragraph essays.　To improve fluency students will keep a journal that must be completed weekly.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to help students write clearly in English on a number of  topics and to bridge the gap between short assignments and longer research papers.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Students can only learn by being involved. The instructor will guide but it is up to the student to observe and learn.

第1回: Introduction to the course. Explanation of the syllabus. Introduction to process writing. Explanation of standard paragraph layout. General vocabulary assessment.
第2回: Start work on Unit 1. Focus on analyzing the content of an expository paragraph. Journal sharing. Practice brainstorming.
第3回: Continue work on Unit 1. Submit paragraph 1. Journal sharing.
第4回: Start work on Unit 2. Practice more brainstorming and a deeper focus on organization. Journal sharing.
第5回: Continue work on Unit 2. More practice with editing and peer editing. Journal sharing.
第6回: Start work on Unit 3. Focus on using supporting information and details. Journal sharing.
第7回: Continue work on Unit 3. Focus on direct and indirect speech. Journal sharing.
第8回: Start work on Unit 4. Focus on attention-getting writing techniques. Journal Sharing.
第9回: Continue work on Unit 4. Prepare a paragraph that provides definitions. Study how to avoid repetition. Journal sharing.
第10回: Start work on Unit 5. Focus on the cause-and-effect style of writing. Journal sharing.
第11回: Continue work on Unit 5. Practicing with signal words that indicate cause and effect. Journal sharing.
第12回: Start work on Unit 6. Study how to prepare suggestions.
第13回: Continue work on Unit 6. Focus on the use of modifiers to make writing more compelling. Journal sharing. Submit Essay 02 final draft.
第14回: Review of key process writing elements. Final essay sharing. Review what you learned during the semester.
